CustomField.formula: IF( AND(NOT(ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Subtype__c, "Partner Agreement (GPP)")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Subtype__c, "Amendment")),RecordType.DeveloperName = 'SSA', ISBLANK(APTS_Ext_ID__c)), "TRUE", IF( AND(ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Subtype__c, "Amendment"), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Parent_Agreement__r.Apttus__Subtype__c, "Partner Agreement (GPP)")),RecordType.DeveloperName = 'SSA', ISBLANK(APTS_Ext_ID__c)), "TRUE", "FALSE"))
CustomField.label: Related Opportunity Mandatory Check
